snippet: A seller of a duplex penthouse at 50 Central Park South based his asking price on recent trophy sales in the $70 million-to-$80 million range.
abstract: Owner of a duplex penthouse at 50 Central Park South is asking $95 million, based on recent sales of trophy properties in the same building in the $70 million-to-$80 million range; relatively small supply of sprawling apartments with spectacular views of the park and the seemingly insatiable demand for them are leading sellers to make such aggressive selling moves.
lead_paragraph: A seller of a duplex penthouse at 50 Central Park South based his asking price on recent trophy sales in the $70 million-to-$80 million range.

headline.print_headline: The Market Is Speaking. It Says $95 Million.
headline.seo: Central Park South/Exclusive — The Market Is Speaking. It Says $95 Million.
headline.main: The Market Is Speaking. It Says $95 Million.
